singular.additionalStaff.swapped: Swapped {{staff|1}} in for position {{abbreviation|2}} for episode {{episode|3}}.
singular.admin.guild.added: Added {{staff|1}} as an administrator for this guild.
singular.admin.guild.removed: I removed {{staff|1}}'s administrator privileges from this guild.
singular.alias.addedAlias: I added {{alias|1}} as an alias for `{{project|2}}` for you.
singular.alias.removedAlias: I removed the alias {{alias|1}} from `{{project|2}}` for you.
singular.conga.added: I added {{current|1}} → {{next|2}} to the Conga line for you.
singular.conga.empty: There is nobody doing the Conga for this project.
singular.conga.removed: I removed {{current|1}} from the Conga line for you.
singular.episode.added: I added episode {{number|1}} to `{{project|2}}` for you.
singular.episode.removed: I removed episode {{number|1}} from `{{project|2}}` for you.
singular.error.alias.inUse: That alias is already in use in `{{aliasproj|1}}`.
singular.error.alias.resolutionFailed: Could not resolve alias {{alias|1}} to a project.
singular.error.anidb.apiError: Air date unknown: AniDB API error
singular.error.anidb.notSpecified: Air date unknown: Not specified on AniDB
singular.error.anidb.responseEmpty: Air date unknown: AniDB response empty
singular.error.blameFailureGeneric: The project is complete, or the specified episode could not be found.
singular.error.conga.alreadyExists: That task is already a link in the Conga line!
singular.error.doneFailureGeneric: Your task is complete for all episodes, or the specified episode could not be found.
singular.error.incorrectAirTimeFormat: Air time must be a 24-hour HH:MM time, ex: 16:30
singular.error.incorrectBooleanFormat: This value is a boolean and must be either 'true', 'false', 'yes', or 'no'
singular.error.missingChannelPerms:
I do not have sufficient permissions for {{channel|1}}!
Please ensure I have `VIEW_CHANNEL`, `SEND_MESSAGES`, and `EMBED_LINKS` permissions in that channel!
singular.error.missingChannelPermsRelease:
I do not have sufficient permissions for {{channel|1}}!
Please ensure I have `VIEW_CHANNEL`, `SEND_MESSAGES`, `MANAGE_MESSAGES`, `MENTION_EVERYONE`, and `EMBED_LINKS` permissions in that channel!
singular.error.noRoster: There are no key staff assigned to that project.
singular.error.noSuchChannel: I could not find a channel with that ID. If possible, use the channel _ID_, not the channel name.
singular.error.noSuchConga: That Conga Participant does not exist!
singular.error.notPrivileged: You must be an administrator to perform this action!
singular.error.observerNoOp: You need to either enable /blame or provide a webhook to observe!
singular.error.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to do that.
singular.progress.bulk:
I see you've been busy.
**{{taskName|1}}** for episodes {{start_episode|2}} through {{end_episode|3}} have been updated.
singular.progress.done: Nice job getting the **{{taskName|1}}** for episode {{episode|2}} done.
singular.progress.done.inTheDust:
Your team is still working on episode **{{currentEpisode|1}}**, but your task there is already done.
The next episode awaiting **{{taskName|2}}** is episode **{{nextEpisode|3}}**; did you want me to mark that one done instead?
singular.progress.done.inTheDust.dontDoIt: Okay; I won't touch anything, then.
singular.progress.done.inTheDust.question: What do you want me to do?
singular.progress.done.inTheDust.timeout: I waited a whole minute, and you didn't tell me what you wanted!
singular.progress.projectComplete:
**{{title|1}}** is complete.
Great job to everyone involved!
singular.progress.skipped:
**{{taskName|1}}** for episode {{episode|2}} has been skipped.
If you wish to do it for realsies, `/undone` it first.
singular.progress.undone: So the episode {{episode|1}} **{{taskName|2}}** wasn't done, after all.
singular.project.created:
I created project `{{nickname|1}}` for you. You may want to consider the following:
1. `/addstaff` to add positions
2. `/setweight to re-order positions
3. `/editproject`: `AniDB` & `AirTime24h` to set airing date/times, and `/airreminder enable` to get airing notifications.
singular.project.deleted: Cleaned out the **{{project|1}}** project for you. 残念。
singular.project.edited.motdHelp: To reset this value, set a hyphen: `-`
